name: Chasu
description: A sliced flavourful pork meat with a selection of season vegetables.

name: Grilled Chicken Breast
description: Tender grilled chicken breast seasoned to perfection, served with a side of fresh vegetables.

name: Pan-Seared Salmon
description: Fresh Atlantic salmon fillet, pan-seared and served with a citrus-infused sauce.

name: Grilled Beef Steak
description: Juicy beef steak grilled to your liking, served with roasted vegetables and a red wine reduction sauce.

name: Stir-Fried Tofu
description: Crispy tofu stir-fried with mixed vegetables in a savory soy-based sauce.

name: Roast Turkey Breast
description: Tender slices of roast turkey breast served with mashed potatoes and gravy.
